description: A giant gooey chocolate chip cookie is the perfect sharing dessert and is so simple to make in the slow cooker.
name: Slow Cooker Giant Gooey Chocolate Chip Cookie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease the slow cooker basin with a little butter, add a layer of foil and parchment paper and grease it.
Beat the rest of the butter and sugar until pale and fluffy in a stand mixer. Add the egg and vanilla extract. Tip in the flour and baking soda and beat until just combined.
Stir in the chopped chocolate and scoop the mix into the lined slow cooker. Smooth out with a spatula, place the lid on and cook on high for 2.5 hours until set but slightly gooey in the middle.
